page.title: 04NOW, A BOY'S LIFE
page.content: In Letham a boy has plenty to do.For instance there is a park where you can play football and just next to it there is a Cub hut where the Cubs meet on Tuesdays, and Scouts on Fridays. Discos and jumble sales are held for funds. I wake up at 7.50am in the morning and leave for school at 8.30am.At 10.45 there is an interval for 15 mins.At 12.25 we get out for lunch and return at 1.40.School comes out at 3.30pm,I don't have far to go home.On Thursday and Sundays my friends and I have a club called "THE WARLOCK CLUB"where we exchange role playing {adventure game-books}to see who can get through the difficult adventures. Living in the country we can also fish in the burn and climb trees.
